Title of course/seminar: Estudio psicométrico de un examen de opción múltiple
Organising entity: Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
Type of entity: University
Faculty, institute or centre: Escuela Politécnica Superior
Duration in hours: 2 hours
Start date: 2009
5
Title of course/seminar: Gestión de Proyectos Multinacionales
Goals of the course/seminar: Dotar a investigadores y responsables de gestión de proyectos de instituciones
públicas y privadas, de los conocimientos y habilidades técnicas, que les permitan afrontar con garantías la
ejecución y finalización satisfactoria de los mismos.
Organising entity: Madri+d
Duration in hours: 13 hours
Start date: 2008
Target group profile: 1) Management Course Students of Science and Technology, part of the Training
Programme madrid R+D 2) Researchers, doctors, managers and professionals of R + D + I
Provable tasks: Content extracted form http://www.madrimasd.org/formacion/anios-anteriores/2008/pdf/
gestionDeCienciaYTecnologia/gestionDeProyectosMultinacionales.pdf 1. Institutional architecture, budgets,
committee structure and policies of R + D + i 2. Seventh Framework Programme 3. Multinational Projects:
Preparation and submission of proposals for Framework Programme 4. European Project Management from the
perspective of a researcher 5. Experience of Telefónica R+D in International Projects 6. Other EU multinational
projects 7. IBEROEKA projects. International Projects with Latin America
6

Title of course/seminar: Campus Excelencia 2005
Goals of the course/seminar: " to make relevant personalities in the fields of Science, Economy, Culture and
World Politics, get into contact with recent postgraduates in a relaxed atmosphere where students can meet
experts who will help them to guide their future"
City organizing entity: Canary Islands, Spain
Organising entity: Universidad de las Palmas de Gran
Canaria
Type of entity: University
Duration in hours: 40 hours
Start date: 2005
Target group profile: Extract from http://www.campusdeexcelencia.info/campus-de-excelencia.html?lan=EN
